message.body: (1/2) Hey i don't know if you are free tonight but about an hour ago Brauhaus posted that they have 12 fee tickets to the fame tonight if you take their beer bu
(2/2) s. Let me know if you go
Maybe I can get out of the office, what time is the bus?
(1/2) Laura and i are probably taking the train though. We were thinking about taking the bus tonight but Laura probably can't get back to the city in time to c
I can meet u at 6 if you want to take the bus but would we all be able to sit together?
Maybe I should just take it easy and be fresh for work in the am
Fair enough, i just figured id give you a heads up
Awesome thanks for the invite I guess I'll stay west.
I'm excited, i hope we win
